onboardFirstTitle: Find out the status of the beaches.
onboardSecondDesc:
Report how many people are on your beach. 

 Help others choose less crowded destinations and discover new places!
onboardFirstDesc:
Stay updated on the real crowding of the beaches in the affiliated municipalities. 

 The staff of the municipalities will constantly update the status of the beaches, so you can choose where to go!
faq1_description:
The app inSpiaggia helps you to avoid crowded beaches in Puglia, letting you choose a location according to your needs, thanks to the collaboration of the affiliated municipalities. Each municipality has staff on the beaches that will report the status of the beaches! 
 You will finally have the opportunity to enjoy the relax and peace of the seaside without having to rush to occupy the last free spot.
faq2_description: The app allows you to check the status of the free beach you have chosen, but also to explore places you don't know! Each beach has its own information sheet with its main features, with weather forecasts and much more. Once you have selected your destination, you will be able to start navigating to the location and share this beach with your friends.
faq3_description:
The app provides information on the maximum capacity of the beaches. Considering this data, you can also report any overcrowding, which will be checked by an operator on site. 
 You can choose in peace and with awareness where you can spend your day on the seaside, displaying the status of the beach whenever you want. 
 The app will also inform you about local events nearby, ensuring a complete experience in the area, moreover, you can save your favourite destinations.
faq4_description:
The app was born from a pilot project that involves the following coastal municipalities: Mola di Bari, Polignano a Mare, Monopoli, Ostuni, Carovigno and others (the list of municipalities grows every day). 
 These virtuous municipalities, with their volunteers, will report the crowded states of the beaches, offering a complete and integrated service also with info and local events. So you no longer have to search the web for communications and information that is often difficult to find!
faq5_description: Innopa s.r.l. is an innovative start-up that provides process optimization services for activities of public and/or private interest. Innopa s.r.l. was born from the idea of two young people from Puglia and is the winner of the \Regional PIN\ project, financed with resources from the Development and Cohesion Fund and the PO Puglia 2014/2020. You can find more information on www.innopa.it

gpsDisabled_errorDescription:
Unable to get your position. 
Did you enable the location services? Are you outdoor?
Check it and try again.
permissionModalGPS_messageReport:
You need to enable location services in order to report on beach status.

It is only needed to verify that you actually are on the spot.
reportFail_tooFarDescription:
Unable to send reports for this beach, you're too far away.

Get closer to the spot and try again.
